original_text: But Jacob went to Succoth instead. He built a house for himself, and he made huts for his animals. That is why the place is called Succoth.
korean_text: 야곱은 숙곳에 이르러 자기를 위하여 집을 짓고 그의 가축을 위하여 우릿간을 지었으므로 그 땅 이름을 숙곳이라 부르더라

sentences.original_text: But Jacob went to Succoth instead.
He built a house for himself,
and he made huts for his animals.
That is why the place is called Succoth.
